suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Cover PrivacyInfo.xcprivacy file creation, NSPrivacyTrackedDomains, NSPrivacyCollectedDataTypes, required reason APIs, and App Store submission requirements since May 2024

suggestedNewContent.title: iOS Permissions and Info.plist
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Cover NSCameraUsageDescription, NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription, NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription, App Transport Security settings, and other iOS-specific permission strings

suggestedNewContent.title: Common iOS App Store Rejection Reasons
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: List top rejection reasons: missing privacy policy, crashes, incomplete metadata, guideline 2.1 (completeness), guideline 4.3 (spam), guideline 5.1 (privacy), and how to avoid them

suggestedNewContent.title: TestFlight Beta Distribution
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Cover TestFlight setup, internal vs external testers, build distribution, gathering feedback before App Store release

suggestedNewContent.title: Xcode and SDK Requirements (2024-2025)
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Cover current Xcode 15+ requirement, iOS 17 SDK, upcoming Xcode 16 requirement by April 2025, and how to check/update Xcode version

suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Full step-by-step example from flutter build ipa to App Store Connect upload, including export options plist configuration
